# rootElement()

**Instance Method**

Returns the root element of the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
func rootElement() -> XMLElement?
```

## Return Value

The root element of the receiver.

## Managing the Root Element

- **setRootElement(_:)**: Set the root element of the receiver.
